question: Which union ministry has signed agreement with German firm GIZ for technical cooperation in transport projects?
option1: Ministry of Drinking Water and Sanitation
option3: Ministry of Road Transport and Highways
option4: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs Ministry
answer: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs Ministry
explanation: The Union Housing and Urban Affairs Ministry (MoHUA ) has signed an agreement with German firm GIZ for technical cooperation in the implementation of transport projects in Coimbatore, Bhubaneshwar and Kochi. The agreement has been signed by the ministry\'s officer on special duty Mukund Kumar Sinha, and GIZ Country Director Wolfgang Hanning in the presence of Housing and Urban Affairs Minister Hardeep Singh Puri. As per agreement, an amount of around Rs 29 crore through GIZ is envisaged for this purpose over a period of three years. The main objective of the agreement is to improve planning and implementation of sustainable urban transport.
